name: A Trip Through Hell
description: This game is a rage platformer. It is commposed of 3 levels and a small boss fight a the end. To beat the level you must shoot ghosts, jump over flames and avoid flaming clouds. You can move left and right with arrow keys press space to jump and X to shoot a fire ball. Fire balls can kill the ghosts when one ghost dies the others get scared and leave. I hope you enjoy this game I put a lot of work in to it thank you for playing
